name: UnilateralMastectomyRight
title: Unilateral Mastectomy Right
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent unilateral mastectomy of the left breast.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with  a unilateral mastectomy of the left breast. This is a grouping value set of SNOMEDCT and ICD10PCS codes),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain  to a left, right or bilateral mastectomy.)

concept.display: Resection of Right Breast, Open Approach
Postmastectomy lymphedema syndrome of right upper limb (disorder)
History of prophylactic mastectomy of right breast (situation)
Modified radical mastectomy of right breast (procedure)
